text: KGLC (100.9 FM) is a radio station licensed to Miami, Oklahoma, United States. The station is currently owned by Northeast Oklahoma Broadcast Network, Inc. ==History== This station was assigned call sign KGLC on March 7, 1991. KORS on January 1, 1979 and KSSM on November 25, 1981. ==References== ==External links== *http://okradiostation.com/kglc-100-9-fm/ GLC Category:Oldies radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1979
title: KGLC
